course_title: Topics in the History of Modern Philosophy

sections.comments: We pursue a deep dive into the main skeptical writings leading up to Kierkegaard's famous dictum "truth is subjectivity," namely the essay "De Omnibus Dubitandum Est" (1841) and the book Philosophical Crumbs (1844).All lectures will be recorded and uploaded to a Youtube playlist. All students who have access to Youtube will be able to access the lectures asynchronously.

description: Intensive study of a major philosopher or school such as Descartes, Hume, Empiricism, Rationalism, or the British utilitarians.
